Articles.Content:
I'm having some issues with .90 and I'm not quite sure where the problem is (likely with a mod).

Currently if I make a new career if I accept the first two contracts of launching a vessel and reaching an altitude that happens successfully. The next contracts to do a crew report in n1gh and Bill's something or other are able to be fulfilled but I can't delete the successful notification but I can discard it. Once I do that both contracts move from showing as completed to incomplete and I can go through the same process again with the same result.

So, what I noticed in addition is once I updated the game and downloaded the newest versions of the mods I actually have some navball issues and I don't see any trajectory information in the map view. There are no lines to show my path.

Right now the mods are:

AutoAsparagus

B9

Better science labs

enhancednavball (which I'm going to remove and test right after this post to see if it at least fixes one of the issues)

Firespitter

FMRS

JSI

KAX

Advanced flybywire

KWRocketry

Infernal Robotics

MechJeb2

NearFuture Construction

NearFuture Solar

SafeChute

StageRecovery (maybe this is a possible issue)

ModuleManager2.5.6
